name: Antiquitas
description:
Antiquitas is an ancient civilization city builder and simulation game. It is basically the game you have always been waiting for. Transport yourself back to ancient Roman times where you are given an empty plot of land and a few coins. Transform the land into the ancient city of your dreams! With many technologies to unlock, servants to purchase, independence to gain, and over two hundred unique buildings to create, Antiquitas will keep you playing for months.

Currently available civilizations are the Romans, the Gaul, and the Egyptians.

* Various sound effects provided by ZEDorDEAD
* Various graphics created by jova
* Midi soundtrack from mfiles
